title: Geode
summaries: The Geode is a rare consumable that can be thrown with the ⚒ Use / Attack button, causing them to drop different two types of gems upon impact with blocks. The amount of gems varies from 3 to 6. The Geode has a 1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by Granite Elementals and Granite Golems.

statistics.Tooltip: May drop valuable shinies when smashed!
statistics.Sell: 5 SC
